name: Pain, Plague and Pestilence
description:
Welcome to Pain, Plague and Pestilence! 

Our game follows the town doctor on his quest to find a cure for a virus going around the town infecting residents and turning them into zombies. On his quest he encounters many creatures that he will have to defeat in order to find the cure, such as flaming skulls, zombies, and boss type enemies. 

How to play:

The controls are simple! 

W, A, S, D to move around. 

Mouse to aim your weapons!

Spacebar to execute your attack!

Q to cycle between deadly potions!

G to unleash a savage throw for the selected potion.

H to heal when you're low on health points!

P to pause the game.

and finally, 1 or 2 to switch between your arsenal of weapons!
